A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The best movie in the entire franchise\, and the first one that made me care about the series. Since I have no childhood nostalgia about the original trilogy (watched all the movies first time in 2015)\, I can say that this was the most fun and entertaining movie out of all 8 of them. I don't really care for the fanservice that was in 7\, so this was finally something anyone could enjoy.
